Metadata.name: Michael Torres
Metadata.description: Full-stack Systems Engineer with expertise in React, React Native, Next.js, Node.js, and SQL/NoSQL databases like PostgreSQL and MongoDB.

Hero.description: Full-stack Systems Engineer with expertise in React, React Native, Next.js, Node.js, and SQL/NoSQL databases like PostgreSQL and MongoDB.

About.title: About
About.summary: My expertise focuses on front-end technologies like React and Next.js, complemented by strong back-end development skills with Node.js and database systems. I excel in collaborative environments and am passionate about creating elegant solutions to complex technical challenges.

items.title: Systems Monitor
items.description: As a Systems Monitor, I provided technical support to students and faculty, assisting with system management and troubleshooting. I also contributed to the development of internal applications, enhancing the university's digital infrastructure.

Acquired skills in Full Stack software development, including React, React Native, Next.js, Node.js, PHP, Java, C#, Python, and databases (SQL/NoSQL), with practical knowledge in agile methodologies (SCRUM) and network/server management.
Achieved B2 level (CEFR) with ability to communicate fluently in professional settings, understand technical texts, and express ideas clearly in both spoken and written form.
Developed skills in document management, file administration, office software tools, and coordination of administrative activities to enhance organizational efficiency.

Projects.title: My Projects
Projects.subtitle: Check out my latest work
Projects.description: I've worked on a variety of projects, from simple websites to complex web applications. Here are a few of my favorites.

items.title: Real Time Chat
items.description: Built a real-time chat application featuring user authentication, private messaging, and group chats, leveraging React, Express, and Socket.io. The application can be tested by creating two accounts in different browser tabs, different browsers, or different devices.

items.title: Project and Task Management
items.description: Created a project and task management application with features for creating, updating, and deleting projects and tasks, using React, Express, and PostgreSQL.

items.title: Portfolio Template
items.description: Designed a portfolio template using React, Sass and Framer Motion, featuring smooth animations and a responsive design.

items.title: This Portfolio Website
items.description: Engineered a personal portfolio website using Next.js, Typescript, and TailwindCSS, showcasing my projects and skills with a focus on performance and SEO.

items.title: Social Media Application
items.description: Full-stack social media app with React Native and Convex, featuring authentication, posts, likes, comments, and real-time synchronization. To test the app, scan the Expo QR code with the Expo Go app.

items.title: Music Player Application
items.description: A sleek music player app with playlists, favorites, artist browsing, search, and seamless playback. Includes volume control, dark mode, and a custom audio player. Scan the Expo QR code with Expo Go to test.

Certifications.title: Certifications
Certifications.subtitle: My professional achievements
Certifications.description: Key certifications that highlight my technical expertise and professional growth.

items.title: Switching, Routing and Wireless Essentials
items.description: Gained expertise in CISCO Switching, Routing, and Wireless Essentials, covering fundamental concepts and practical applications.

items.title: Introduction to networks
items.description: Acquired foundational knowledge of CISCO networking, including protocols, topologies, and security practices.

items.title: SCRUM for software development
items.description: Developed a strong understanding of SCRUM methodology, focusing on principles, roles, and best practices for software development.

items.title: API RESTful
items.description: Learned to design and implement secure and efficient RESTful APIs, emphasizing authentication and scalability.

items.title: Professional GIT
items.description: Mastered advanced Git workflows and best practices for version control in collaborative environments.

items.title: Open English
items.description: Obtained a B2 certification from Open English, showcasing advanced proficiency in English, including fluency in conversational and written communication.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.subtitle: Get in Touch
Contact.description_post: Use any of the social links provided. I'll respond as soon as I can!
